strategy_reasoning: Using standalone images to distinctively showcase the functional updates (usage tracking/pricing) separately from the creative updates (video aspect ratios). This allows for specific visual metaphors for 'data transparency' vs 'cinematic framing' without forcing a narrative link.
story_arc: From administrative clarity to creative freedom

images.prompt: Abstract 3D visualization of golden data streams flowing into a transparent, organized digital dashboard structure. Cyberpunk aesthetic, glowing nodes, intricate circuit patterns, high contrast lighting, symbolizing data tracking and usage metrics. No text.
images.description: Visualizing the new user usage tracking endpoint and token system

images.prompt: A flawless crystal prism floating in a dark void, refracting complex white light into perfectly organized, distinct vertical beams of color. Geometric harmony, clean glass textures, symbol of clarity and transparency, 8k resolution. No text.
images.description: representing the clarified pricing UI and transparency

images.prompt: Cinematic ultra-widescreen composition of a dancer made of swirling neon stardust and light particles. Dynamic motion, deep depth of field, 21:9 aspect ratio framing, vibrant purple and teal lighting, surreal performance art. No text.
images.description: Showcasing the new aspect ratio control for Seedance-pro video generation

images.prompt: A futuristic neural network garden, bioluminescent digital flowers blooming with fiber optic roots connecting to a central glowing core. Vibrant, tech aesthetic, intricate detail, symbolizing the open source ecosystem. No text.

caption:
Transparency ü§ù Creative Control.

We've pushed some fresh code to give you more insight into your usage and more power over your pixels. ü¶æ

‚ú® **New Usage Tracking:** We added a `/api/usage` endpoint so you can see exactly where your tokens are going. Transparency is key.

üé¨ **Cinematic Control:** The `seedance-pro` model now supports aspect ratio parameters. Widescreen, portrait, square‚Äîframe your AI video exactly how you envisioned it.

üíé **Crystal Clear:** We've updated the pricing UI to make model costs and token usage easier to understand at a glance.

alt_text: A carousel of images: 1. Abstract golden data streams visualizing usage tracking. 2. A crystal prism representing clarity. 3. A cinematic widescreen abstract dancer representing video aspect ratios. 4. A glowing digital flower representing the Pollinations ecosystem.
